title: MEGA
description: MEGA is a simulation code for plasma physics research. This code is distributed under the MIT License, and proper citation of the associated publication is required when used.
notes: When using this code, please cite the following article: Todo, Y., 'Energetic particle driven Alfvén eigenmodes and associated energetic particle redistribution in a tokamak burning plasma', Nuclear Fusion, 2025. https://doi.org/10.1088/1741-4326/ae059f
